page.title: 15BARROW SHOP
page.content: THERE IS ONE SHOP WHICH IS ALSO A POST OFFICE .Mr MARSON WHO RUN'S THE POST OFFICE HAD BEEN A SHOP KEEPER FOR 10 YEARS .HE HAD LIVED IN BARROW FOR 45 YEARS .HE SAID HE WAS VERY BUSY ON PENSION DAY AND SATURDAY.ALOT OF PEOPLE DEPEND ON THE SHOP FOR FOOD BUT THEY HAVE TO GO TO DIFERENT PLACES FOR CLOTHES.SOME OF THE OTHER VILLAGER'S SHOP IN BARROW SHOP.THE POST OFFICE IS ON THE MAIN STREET WHICH IS CALLED TWYFORD ROAD.HERE IS SOME OF THE PRODUCTS IN THE SHOP. BREAKFAST CEREALS. CLEANING MATERIALS. PET FOOD. FRUIT. VEGATABLES.BY ANDREW YUONG SIMON FAXON.
